author: CBR
description:
No, it’s not Peacemaker Season 3. In this Heroes Journey clip, we recap what James Gunn said in an hour-long press conference: those Peacemaker threads (Salvation, Checkmate, etc.) are set to continue in future DCU projects—likely Lanterns and Superman: Man of Tomorrow. Which means you might even see John Cena pop up there instead of a traditional S3.

#Peacemaker #DCU #Superman #JamesGunn #CBR #HeroesJourney #Podcast

title: When will #Peacemaker characters return to the DCU? #dcu #jamesgunn #cbr #heroesjourney
